resources.string:
=>Start Point: oxi Square
 	=>Head north on Trikoupi
 	=>Turn right onto Achilleos
 	=>Turn left onto Areos
 	=>Turn right onto Onisilou
 	=>Turn left onto Xatzigiorgakis Kornesios
 On your right side is the House of Hadjigiorgakis Kornesios
\t=>Turn left onto Patriarchou Gregoriou\n \t=>Continue onto Plaeia Tyllirias\n On your right side is the Hamam Omeriye
\t=>Turn left onto Trikoupi\n \t=>Slight left onto Areos\n On your left side is the Mosque Omeriye

=>Turn left towards Areos
 	=>Turn left onto Areos
 	=>Turn left onto Liasidou
 	=>Turn left onto Trikoupi
 	=>Slight right onto Thrakis
 	=>Turn right onto Agiou Savva
 On your right side is the Agios Savvas Church

=>Turn right onto Aisxylou
 	=>Turn left onto Sofokleous
 	=>Turn right at Onasagorou
 	FANEROMENI CHURCH IS ON THE LEFT!!!!
